Package ru.dest.library.task

Interface ITaskManager

public interface ITaskManager
Represents an any manager of tasks
Since:
1.0
Author:
DestKoder

  • Method Details

    • call

      String call​(Runnable r)
      Call a parallel task
      Parameters:
      r - task to call
      Returns:
      internal if of task (can be used in cancel(String)

    • callAsync

      String callAsync​(Runnable r)
      Call a parallel asynchronous task
      Parameters:
      r - task to call
      Returns:
      internal if of task (can be used in cancel(String)

    • callLater

      String callLater​(Runnable r, long time)
      Calls a parallel task after the specified time
      Parameters:
      r - task to call
      time - time after which the task will be called
      Returns:
      internal if of task (can be used in cancel(String)

    • callLaterAsync

      String callLaterAsync​(Runnable r, long time)
      Calls a parallel asynchronous task after the specified time
      Parameters:
      r - task to call
      time - time after which the task will be called
      Returns:
      internal if of task (can be used in cancel(String)

    • callRepeating

      String callRepeating​(Runnable r, long time)
      Calls a repeating task
      Parameters:
      r - task to call
      time - repeating time
      Returns:
      internal if of task (can be used in cancel(String)

    • callRepeatingAsync

      String callRepeatingAsync​(Runnable r, long time)
      Calls a repeating asynchronous task
      Parameters:
      r - task to call
      time - repeating time
      Returns:
      internal if of task (can be used in cancel(String)

    • cancel

      void cancel​(String id)
      Cancel a task with specified ID. Only working with tasks which was called via ITaskManager methods
      Parameters:
      id - internal identified of a task

    • cancelAll

      void cancelAll()
      Cancel all called task. Not needed to invoke as usually.
